TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeProviderCreator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines a group of methods that classes can use to create a type provider for an activity or workflow designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Reflection.Assembly GetLocalAssembly(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Object> for which to obtain the local assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetLocalAssembly provides the assembly returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider.LocalAssembly%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService GetTypeResolutionService(object obj) cil managed
